description.raw:
Prior to [Gazebo Pull Request #160](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebo/pull-request/160), the hokuyo and camera models had gravity disabled since they do not contain a collision element. As discussed in [Gazebo Issue 274](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebo/issue/274), it was decided that that should not be the default behavior for links without collision elements, but that they should explicitly disable gravity instead. This patch accompanies this change to Gazebo.

I tested using a box collision elements for these sensors, but the contacts cause jitter in the orientation that is very noticeable in the sensor output. I decided it was simpler to restore the previous behavior by explicitly disabling gravity.
